class Net(nn.Model):

 # 1 input image channel, 6 output channels, 3x3 square convolution

 x = F.relu(self.fc1(x))
 x = F.relu(self.fc2(x))
 x = self.fc3(x)
 return x

 size = x.size()[1: ] # all dimensions except the batch dimension
 num_features = 1
 for s in size:
